isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 5 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS SPICER ES70-5 - REASSEMBLY - SHIFTER HOUSING

step1.para: Begin reassembly by installing the plunger in the 1st-reverse shift bracket ( Figure 62).

figure.caption: Figure 62. Plunger in 1st - Reverse Shift Bracket

step1.para: Install the 1st-reverse spring and poppet ball into the housing ( Figure 63). Tap the shift rod through the housing, bracket, and 1st-reverse shift fork. Secure the bracket with a setscrew. Tighten to 34 to 41 ft-lbs. (46 to 56 N•m). Tap the roll pin through the shift fork to secure it. Reinstall the housing plug.

figure.caption: Figure 63. 1st - Reverse Spring and Poppet Ball

step1.para: Install the interlock in the housing boss between the 1st-reverse and 2nd-3rd speed shift bars ( Figure 64). Install the spring and poppet ball into the housing underneath the shift bar. Install the bar and fork assembly, securing it with a setscrew. Tighten the setscrew to 34 to 41 ft-lbs. (46 to 56 N•m). Reinstall the housing plug.

Install the interlock in the housing boss between 2nd-3rd and 4th-5th speed shift bars ( Figure 65). Place the spring and poppet ball into the housing underneath the shift bar. Install the bar and fork assembly. Secure with a setscrew. Tighten the setscrew to 34 to 41 ft-lbs. (46 to 56 N•m). Reinstall the housing plug.

figure.caption: Figure 65. Interlock in Housing Boss - 2nd - 3rd and 4th - 5th Speed Shift Bars
